heading: HB00533
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL CENTER FOR MISSING CHILDREN AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
short-title: National Center For Missing Children Act
status: Pending with the Committee on WELFARE OF CHILDREN since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00533
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL CENTER FOR MISSING CHILDREN AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : National Center For Missing Children Act
ABSTRACT : Mandates the Center to provide information and coordinates public and private initiatives to reunite missing children with their families.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GONZAGA, RUWEL PETER S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
